name: Realty Pack Core
author: EightQueens

sections.description:
Realty Pack is a dynamic and fully customizable WordPress theme, made specifically for Real Estate professionals.

This theme gives you all the tools required to create beautiful and professional real estate websites powered by WordPress without any technical knowledge. Realty Pack is a user friendly builder, using drag & drop methods and Elementor’s Page Editor. It is easy to navigate and puts the power and control back in the hands of the website owner. It is integrated with the latest version of WordPress and makes use of all the new features like the advanced Customizer, Custom Post Formats, Responsive Design, and more. Realty Pack allows you to quickly and easily create templates for 4 different kinds of pages/elements and offers 40+ customizable widgets.

With the theme dedicated only to the real estate industry, you will find tools like the Single Property or Single Agent builder, Property Widgets, Agency Post formats and more tools specific to real estate.
sections.faq:
Automatic installation (easiest way)

log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “RealtyPack Core” and click Search Plugins. Once you have found it you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Download realty-pack-core.zip
  2. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  3. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  4. Select realty-pack-core.zip from your computer
  5. Click ‘Install Now’
  6. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download realty-pack-core.zip
  2. Extract the realty-pack-core directory to your computer
  3. Upload the realty-pack-core directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to install a WordPress plugin.

Updating

You can use automatic update to update the plugin safely.

Minimum Requirements

  1. WordPress 4.6 or greater
  2. PHP version 5.4.0 or greater
  3. MySQL version 5.0 or greater
sections.changelog:
1.0.5

  • Fixed 3rd party plugins update.
  • Fixed issue regarding activation on plugins and importer.
  • Fixed Agency contact widget in single builder.
  • Fixed litsing type “unknown”.
  • Fixed Print button link.
  • Fixed Favorite button issue.
  • Fixed compare button issue.
  • Fixed Unit switcher widget issue.
  • Fixed Minor issues in simillar properties.
  • Fixed google map widget in property single.
  • Fixed Sort option and filter bar in property widget.
  • Fixed issue on signin register modal.
  • Fixed some minor issues.

1.0.4

  • Fixed License activation issue.

1.0.3

  • ADDED warning message for update wpl if is required.

1.0.2

  • ADDED activation with license.
  • Fixed demo importer for pro version.
  • Fixed plugin activator for pro version.
  • Fixed some minor issues.

1.0.1

  • Fixed some demo importer issues.
  • Fixed plugin activator issues.

1.0.0

  • Initial version.
